description: Gets the status of audit mitigation action tasks that were executed. Requires permission to access the ListAuditMitigationActionsExecutions action.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Specify this filter to limit results to actions for a specific audit mitigation actions task.

parameters.name: findingId
parameters.description: Specify this filter to limit results to those that were applied to a specific audit finding.

nested_items.name: actionsExecutions
nested_items.description: A set of task execution results based on the input parameters. Details include the mitigation action applied, start time, and task status.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the task that applies the mitigation action.

nested_items.name: findingId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the findings to which the task and associated mitigation action are applied.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the mitigation action being applied by the task.

nested_items.name: actionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the mitigation action being applied by the task.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the task being executed.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the task was started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the task was completed or canceled. Blank if the task is still running.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, the code that indicates which type of error occurred.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, a message that describes the error.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results.
